title: Edge Linux & IoT Device Hardening
subtitle: Secure boot, OTA updates, and telemetry
learning_objectives: Design secure boot mechanisms for edge devices
Reduce attack surface with minimal builds
Implement secure OTA updates and rollback
Plan incident response for edge compromise

content_blocks.title: Guiding Framework

content.text:
### EDGE
- **E**stablish secure boot
- **D**esign minimal images
- **G**uard communications
- **E**nable updates
